languages.text: Новатора Кассию и Висиря Кибеллу сблизило бремя высоких постов, обретенных в молодом возрасте. Эта дружба не прожила долго, ибо заботы и принадлежность к разным мирам оказались сильнее, но две женщины обменялись дарами в знак уважения и в память о пережитых приключениях. Кассия написала кровью Кибеллы удивительное полотно, ставшее реликвией Кровавой паутины. Кибелла же назначила телохранителем Кассии умелого ткача, который, по слухам, спустя много лет он оборвал жизнь госпожи по ее личной просьбе, когда тело Новатора уже не выносило гнет мутаций.

Novator Cassia and Vizsier Kibellah were brought closer by their common burden of assuming a high position of power at a young age. Though their friendship was short-lived, as it could not overcome the gravity of their duties and the differences between the worlds to which they belonged, they exchanged gifts out of respect for each other and to honour the memories of the journeys they had shared. Cassia used Kibellah's blood to paint an incredible piece which became a relic of the Bloodspun Web. Kibellah, in turn, assigned one of her best spinners to act as Cassia's bodyguard. Many years later, this spinner was rumoured to have ended Cassia's life on the Novator's own orders when her body could no longer resist the strain of mutation.

languages.text: La Novator Cassia y la visir Kibellah trabaron una amistad basada en la carga que ambas habían de soportar al asumir cargos de poder a temprana edad. Aunque fue una amistad efímera debido al peso de sus responsabilidades y a las diferencias entre los mundos a los que pertenecían, intercambiaron regalos por respeto mutuo y para honrar el recuerdo de los viajes que habían compartido. Cassia usó la sangre de Kibellah para pintar un maravilloso lienzo que se convirtió en una reliquia de la Red Sanguinolenta. Por su parte, Kibellah asignó a uno de sus mejores tejedores como guardaespaldas personal de Cassia. Muchos años después corrió el rumor de que aquel tejedor había puesto fin a la vida de Cassia por orden de la propia Novator cuando su cuerpo sucumbió a la gravedad de sus mutaciones.

languages.text: ノベイター・カシアとヴィジール・キベラは、若くして高い権力の座に就いたという共通の重荷によって親交を深めた。しかし、二人の友情は長くは続かなかった。職務の重さと所属する世界の違いを乗り越えることができず、短命に終わってしまった。しかし、互いへの敬意と、共に歩んだ旅の思い出を称えるために贈り物を送りあっていた。カシアはキベラの血を使って、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの遺物となった素晴らしい作品を描いた。キベラはカシアのボディーガードとして、彼女の最高の紡ぎ手のひとりを任命した。何年も後、この紡績工は、カシアの体が突然変異の負担に耐えられなくなったとき、ノベイターの命令でカシアの人生を終わらせたと噂された。
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia and Vizsier Kibellah were brought closer by their common burden of assuming a high position of power at a young age. Though their friendship was short-lived, as it could not overcome the gravity of their duties and the differences between the worlds to which they belonged, they exchanged gifts out of respect for each other and to honour the memories of the journeys they had shared. Cassia used Kibellah's blood to paint an incredible piece which became a relic of the Bloodspun Web. Kibellah, in turn, assigned one of her best spinners to act as Cassia's bodyguard. Many years later, this spinner was rumoured to have ended Cassia's life on the Novator's own orders when her body could no longer resist the strain of mutation.

languages.text: 大族长卡西娅与宿老绮贝菈年纪轻轻就身居高位，这样的负担拉近了两人之间的距离。她们之间的友情并不长久，因为她们肩负着极其沉重的职责，而且两人所在的世界也截然不同。但即便如此，她们依然交换了礼物，既是出于对彼此的尊重，也是为了纪念她们曾经共同经历过的旅程。卡西娅用绮贝菈的鲜血画了一幅令人难以置信的传世之作，这幅画成为了织血罗网的圣物，而绮贝菈则委派织血罗网最出色的织网者留在卡西娅身边，担任她的保镖。据说，许多年后，当大族长卡西娅的身体再也无法承受突变的压力时，那位织网者根据卡西娅的命令，结束了她的生命。
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia and Vizsier Kibellah were brought closer by their common burden of assuming a high position of power at a young age. Though their friendship was short-lived, as it could not overcome the gravity of their duties and the differences between the worlds to which they belonged, they exchanged gifts out of respect for each other and to honour the memories of the journeys they had shared. Cassia used Kibellah's blood to paint an incredible piece which became a relic of the Bloodspun Web. Kibellah, in turn, assigned one of her best spinners to act as Cassia's bodyguard. Many years later, this spinner was rumoured to have ended Cassia's life on the Novator's own orders when her body could no longer resist the strain of mutation.

languages.text: Novatorin Cassia und Wesir Kibellah kamen sich durch ihre gemeinsame Bürde, in jungen Jahren einen hohen Posten zu bekleiden, näher. Obwohl ihre Freundschaft nur von kurzer Dauer war, weil sie die Last ihrer Pflichten und die Unterschiede ihrer beider Welten nicht überwinden konnten, tauschten sie aus gegenseitigem Respekt Geschenk aus, um die Erinnerungen an ihre gemeinsamen Reisen zu ehren. Cassia malte mit Kibellahs Blut ein unglaubliches Werk, das zu einem Relikt des Blutgesponnenen Netzes wurde. Im Gegenzug stellte Kibellah Cassia einen ihrer besten Spinner als Leibwächter zur Seite. Viele Jahre später soll dieser Spinner Cassias Leben auf Befehl der Novatorin selbst beendet haben, als ihr Körper dem Druck der Mutation nicht mehr standhalten konnte.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia and Vizsier Kibellah were brought closer by their common burden of assuming a high position of power at a young age. languages.text: La Novator Cassia et la vizir Kibellah se rapprochèrent en vertu de leur destin commun, qui avait voulu qu'elles endossent très jeunes de lourdes responsabilités. Si leur amitié fut écourtée par le poids de leurs devoirs et les différences inconciliables entre leurs mondes respectifs, elles échangèrent néanmoins des cadeaux en gage de respect mutuel et en souvenir des aventures qu'elles avaient partagées. Cassia se servit du sang de la première tisseuse pour peindre une œuvre magnifique appelée à devenir une sainte relique de la Toile de Sang, et en retour, Kibellah affecta l'un de ses meilleurs tisseurs à la garde rapprochée de son ancienne camarade. Bien des années plus tard, le bruit courut que ledit tisseur avait mis fin aux jours de la Novator à sa propre demande, son organisme par trop affaibli étant devenu incapable de résister à la pression des mutations.

Many years later, this spinner was rumoured to have ended Cassia's life on the Novator's own orders when her body could no longer resist the strain of mutation.

languages.text: Rota Reisi Cassia ve Vezir Kibellah, her ikisinin de genç yaşta güç sahibi bir mevkiye gelme yükünü taşıması neticesinde yakınlaştılar. Ancak vazifelerinin yoğunluğu ve ait olduğu dünyalar arasındaki farkları aşamayan arkadaşlıkları uzun ömürlü olmadı. Yine de karşılıklı hürmetlerinden dolayı birbirlerine hediyeler vermeyi ve paylaştıkları yolculuk hatıralarını yâd etmeyi sürdürdüler. Cassia, Kibellah'nın kanını kullanarak muazzam bir eser resmetti. Bu eser, Kanipi Ağı'nın bir yadigârına dönüştü. Karşılığında Kibellah, en iyi dokurlardan birini Cassia'nın koruması olarak tayin etti. Uzun yılların ardından bu dokur, söylentiye göre mutasyonun gerginliğine daha fazla direnemeyen Cassia'nın emriyle Rota Reisi'nin canını aldı.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia and Vizsier Kibellah were brought closer by their common burden of assuming a high position of power at a young age. Though their friendship was short-lived, as it could not overcome the gravity of their duties and the differences between the worlds to which they belonged, they exchanged gifts out of respect for each other and to honour the memories of the journeys they had shared. Cassia used Kibellah's blood to paint an incredible piece which became a relic of the Bloodspun Web. Kibellah, in turn, assigned one of her best spinners to act as Cassia's bodyguard. Many years later, this spinner was rumoured to have ended Cassia's life on the Novator's own orders when her body could no longer resist the strain of mutation.
